titleStmt.title: A letter sent from the Lord Fairfax, &c. Dated at Popleton, January 1. 1659. Superscribed, for the Right Honourable William Lenthall, Esq; speaker to the Parliament, these. Read in Parliament, January 6. 1659. Ordered by the Parliament, that this letter be forthwith printed and published. Thomas St Nicholas, clerk of the Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Streater, and John Macock, printers to the Parliament,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
